page.title: 06TYPES OF HOMES(PART 2)
page.content: {Flats_}The flats had three storeys. They were made of bricks and tiles. They did not have any gardens. {Local Flint Houses_}These houses are made of flint.They have small gardens and the houses have a few bricks in them. {Maisonettes_}Maisonettes have flat roofs with gravel on them.They are houses on top of bungalows.They are made of bricks and plaster.They have balconies but no gardens. {Bungalows_}These are one storey buildings normally for older people.They are made of plaster with slates or tiles on the roofs. There were not any bungalows in Sandy Hill but there were a few near Copes.There were one or two semi_detached.They were made of stone and flint.Most of Sandy Hill was Terraced with one or two detached.
